name: POLI 220
title: Un(Doing) History
description: Engages the politics of history through multiple frames: subject matter, interpretation, and the epistemological precepts that underwrite history as a discipline. Introduces students to a wide range of interdisciplinary literatures that include different historical methodologies, feminist theory, political theory, queer studies, postcolonial theory, and critical race studies.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students.
